Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from DENV3 E protein stem)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20881042]Dengue 1 virus(DENV1):inhibition of infection in BHK-21 cells(IC90<0.1 μM);Dengue 2 virus(DENV2):inhibition of infection in BHK-21 cells(IC90=2 μM);Dengue 3 virus(DENV3):inhibition of infection in BHK-21 cells(IC90=4 μM);Dengue 4 virus(DENV4):inhibition of infection in BHK-21 cells(IC90=1.5 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide shows antiviral activity by inhibiting virus entry.

Literature.Title: Peptide inhibitors of flavivirus entry derived from the E protein stem.
Literature.Author: Schmidt AG, Yang PL, Harrison SC.
